Class ReviewerProfileManager

java.lang.Object
application.ReviewerProfileManager
public class ReviewerProfileManager extends Object
Acts as a manager class for dealing with ReviewerProfile objects. This use of data hiding and encapsulation helps ensure parity between data stored in the local cache and data stored on the MySQL database.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReviewerProfileManager

      public ReviewerProfileManager(DatabaseHelper database)
      Constructs a new ReviewerProfileManager. The given DatabaseHelper will be used to interact with the program's database.

  • Method Details

    • fetchProfiles

      public void fetchProfiles()
      Fetches data used to construct ReviewerProfile objects from the database, constructs those objects, and stores them in a local cache.

    • getOrCreateProfile

      public ReviewerProfile getOrCreateProfile(String userName)
      Retrieves a ReviewerProfile. First, the method checks the local cache for the object. Then, if that fails, it checks the database for the a username match to construct the appropriate ReviewerProfile object. If that fails, then the function will create a new ReviewerProfile and add it into the database.

      This method will never return null.

      Parameters:
      userName - - Username of ReviewerProfile to look for
      Returns:
      pre-existing or new ReviewerProfile object

    • updateProfile

      public void updateProfile(ReviewerProfile profile)
      Pushes the data contained in a local ReviewerProfile to its counterpart stored in the database.
      Parameters:
      profile - - ReviewerProfile to update

    • getProfiles

      public Set<ReviewerProfile> getProfiles()
      Returns an unmodifiable Set containing the current local cache of ReviewerProfile objects.
      Returns:
